name: moekyun.me
profession: providing only the most moe of web services

links.title: Patchwork Archive
links.description: An ongoing archival effort of songs and covers created by VTubers Preserving rhythm, one video at a time

links.title: Patchwork Radio
links.description: A (usually) 24/7 internet radio stream of VTubers songs and covers, forever free and without Ads

links.title: Moekyun Link Shortener
links.description: Make your links a whole lot cuter (and more fun)

links.title: Moekyun Karaoke
links.description: A karaoke player that can play back lyric (LRC) files in sync with video and backing audio. Also supports YouTube Timed Text. More to come!

links.title: VTuber Captcha
links.description: A bring your own user interface CAPTCHA service to test if users are true VTuber fans
